attributes.action: Provide free bus transport in Warwickshire- after county council makes us walk
attributes.additional_details: Warwickshire County Council stop free travel to and from school in Warwickshire- especially the route from Polesworth High School in Polesworth, Staffordshire to and from Warton Village in Warton, Warwickshire both near the town of Tamworth in the Midlands
attributes.background: Bus transport that was free in Warwickshire is being stopped due to cuts!!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about bus services are taken by local transport authorities (usually local councils), and the individual bus company is responsible for the service provided.

If you would like the council to reconsider its decision, you can find out who your local councillor is here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
